programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Secrets of the Chesterfield Islands
programme.desc: French cinematographer Christian Pétron takes us on an extraordinary journey of discovery and adventure to unravel the secrets of the Chesterfield Islands. This scientific detective story follows a unique expedition to this remote coral archipelago in the South Pacific, and for the very first time, the stunning underwater world of the Chesterfield Islands is revealed.

programme.title: Flying Rivers
programme.desc: From the heart of the Amazon rain forest to our European laboratories, climatologists, biologists and chemists are exploring and are starting to understand a mystery: the central role of forests in cloud formation. Spectacular images will illustrate a strong ecological message and increase awareness of the danger that deforestation represents for our planet.

programme.title: The Wild Pacific
programme.desc: The Pacific ocean covers one third of our planet, more than all of the continents combined. For over 200 Million years, it has teemed with life, spawned new species, and launched global weather systems. This stunning work takes viewers into currents that swirl along kelp forests, coral reefs and seamounts, with sharks, whales, sea lions, vast schools of fish bursting from this ocean wilderness.

programme.title: The Mouth
programme.desc: Bettany visits Egypt’s gateway to the world, the Nile’s mouth, before boarding her fabulous ‘dahabiya’ and meeting the crew that will guide her upriver the entire length of Egypt. Sailing south of Cairo, there’s time for Bettany to learn a few ropes onboard before she braves the underground tunnels of a collapsed pyramid, where the earliest known hieroglyphic writing can be found.

programme.title: The River
programme.desc: A hundred miles south of Cairo, Bettany starts on a stretch of Nile that few visitors ever get to see. Once Egypt’s main highway, this was where Cleopatra herself used to travel and be seen by her people. Further upriver, Bettany tracks down Egypt’s lost emblem, the blue lotus flower, and visits the beautiful tombs where Tutankhamen’s discoverer Howard Carter first got hooked on Egypt.

programme.title: The Banks
programme.desc: Traffic on the Nile is building, signaling Bettany’s arrival into Luxor. The crew takes a well-earned break whilst Bettany heads to the west bank to see where generations of skilled royal tomb-builders lived. Bettany also takes in the modern night life and the giant Karnak Temple before returning to the river in time to cross paths with the oldest steam ship on the Nile.

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Life emerged three and a half billion years ago, and since then has evolved into a dazzling variety of shapes and forms. Species that are best adapted to their environment survive. Humans are playing a huge part in this development, turning grasslands and forests into fields and cities, and polluting the air and water. What is happening to evolution? The answer is very simple: us.

programme.title: In the Land of Gorillas
programme.desc: Travel deep into the forest of Gabon, in the footsteps of gorillas. Meet primatologist Juan Salvador and share his passion for the great apes as he reveals his latest discoveries about lowland gorillas in their natural habitat.

programme.title: Plastic: The Real Sea Monster
programme.desc: Millions of tons of plastic enter the ocean every year, from rivers and shores, ships and platforms. The world’s scientists have studied the phenomenon and have come to alarming conclusions. Unlike other refuse, plastic stays in the water without breaking down. It becomes trapped in vast whirlpools of garbage called gyres. How is this deadly killer affecting the world’s oceans, and humanity?

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S14:E4 "Breaking Down Two Hunts, Trail Camera Tips"
programme.desc: On this week's episode, we join Matt Thede in Iowa as he breaks down the three key points (the main one being trail camera tips) that he attributes to the successful harvest of his #1 buck this past fall. Next, Bill gives an update on some of the off-season equipment he's been trying, including shooting the Easton FMJ T64. Then we jump to Josh Sparks and Kaleb Greiner as they go into detail on their plan to get a shot at one of their target bucks using a new food plot. Finally, we join Mike Sawyer on another throwback late season hunt and discuss what led to Mike tagging another giant. Here's a link to the Easton FMJ T64 arrow: https://eastonarchery.com/arrows_/t64/ Here's a link to the Cuddelink Systems we use: https://www.cuddeback.com/cuddelink

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E2 "Last Ditch Effort"
programme.desc: With everything breaking down Dustin and Randy head to an auction to hopefully save their weekend plans of getting seed into the ground.

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E3 "We Got 99 Problems"
programme.desc: It seems that anything that can go wrong will go wrong on The Raven. Randy and Dustin are trying to beat the weather and get and the projects buttoned up before the September opener.

programme.title: Team200 S7:E3 "Kansas Whitetails"
programme.desc: Donnie Monroe chases big whitetails in Kansas.

programme.title: Struttinbuck S10:E3 "Arkansas Part 1"
programme.desc: Heath Graham and his family take their new piece of ground from cattle pastures to a whitetail hotspot. Gavin breaks the ice on opening day of bow season and them Heath keeps the ball rolling all year long.

programme.title: Rival Wild S6:E3 "Dog Bone"
programme.desc: DOG BONE - Luck strikes Deer Camp in Ohio as Jason Brown finds himself in the right place at the right time.

programme.title: Rival Wild S6:E4 "Hang and Bang"
programme.desc: In Ohio Chris Keefer gets a bead on a mystery buck and elects to make a move with a HANG & BANG setup to see if he can get out in front of him. On a different side of the farm, Cody Keefer is still after his first buck. Meanwhile, Casey Keefer is in Kansas still pursuing Shakes and Bob Marley, slowly honing in on Bob's home territory.

programme.title: Canadian Whitetail S10:E3 "The Velvet Queen" HUGE velvet Typical
programme.desc: Baylie Petrersons Bowhunt for a GIANT velvet buck, from a very familiar stand.

programme.title: Breaking Point S8:E3 "Father Time"
programme.desc: Brennen Nading would spend the better half of September with tunnel vision chasing after a particular deer in North Dakota. After a clean miss, the encounters slowed down and he would shift his focus to another area and stumble into an awesome old buck on an exciting October evening archery hunt.

programme.title: Red Rising S6:E3 "Wheat State:Take 1"
programme.desc: Eric and Jason waste no time as Eric draws first blood in Kansas right out the gate.

programme.title: Uncharted Waters with Peter Miller S4:E3 "Peter and his daughter Emily, target Mahi Mahi, Peacock Bass, Largemouth Bass and Tarpon in Miami."
programme.desc: Peter and his daughter Emily catch Mahi Mahi offshore, Peacock and Largemouth Bass in their backyard and travel to downtown miami to catch Tarpon and are treated to an epic sashimi dinner at Uchi Miami with James Beard award winning chef, Tyson Cole.

programme.title: Uncharted Waters with Peter Miller S4:E4
programme.desc: Peter travels 220 miles by boat to Harbour Island, Bahamas trolling for big kingfish, live baiting for tuna and bottom fish for big mutton snapper along the reef. Afterwards they take a swim with and hand feed the famous Green Sea Turtles and cut up some tuna on the way in for some sunset sashimi. PART 1

programme.title: Small Town Hunting S4:E3 "MT Archery Slam Part 2"
programme.desc: One of the best hunting experiences you can have here at Powder River Outfitters. Finishing up in Montana with some more tags punched on some incredible bowhunts!

programme.title: Small Town Hunting S4:E4 "Manitoba Honkers Part 1"
programme.desc: If you’ve never considered making the journey to Manitoba to hunt geese, here are a few reasons you might want to plan a trip to Beartrack Outfitters for next season. The Small Town Hunting crew are knocking big groups out of the sky north of the border!

programme.title: Small Town Hunting S4:E5 "Manitoba Honkers Part 2"
programme.desc: Picking up where we left off North of the border hunting geese with Beartrack Outfitters. This area in Manitoba not only produces large numbers of waterfowl but huge flocks of migrating geese!

programme.title: Silver Kings S6:E4 "Bridges"
programme.desc: Jared and Brent Flack-Davidson, from New York, battle it out with a beast in Islamorada.

programme.title: Flats Class S15:E3 "Stomping Grounds"
programme.desc: Capt. CA heads back to his old stomping grounds of Tampa Bay. He hunts red fish with conservationist and fly guide Capt. Dustin Pack.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry - Junk-Cars & Valet Parking
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad’s unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad’s satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Russ Nagel - Uncle of Anarchy
programme.desc: Russ has become recognized in the entertainment industry for achieving more laughs per minute than any comedian working the circuit today and has also been seen on The Nashville Network, A&E's Comedy on the Road, Showtime's Comedy Club Network, the WB, Spike TV, Comedy Central and the list goes on and on. Being a 26+ year veteran of the comedy stage, Russ keeps the laughs coming fast and furious with an array of topics ranging from family and marriage, to travel and current events, and yes he even throws in some biker stuff too.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jim Mccue - Nothing Personal
programme.desc: With his unique act, Jim keeps the audience on its toes. Volleying between set material and working the crowd, Jim cracks jokes with amazing timing and whip-like precision. A unique blend that is sure to leave the audience roaring with laughter!

programme.title: Moody Molavi - Remove Before Flight
programme.desc: The christian comic is married to his high school sweetheart, who later became his stepsister through the marriage of their parents to each other. That’s where the fun begins as Moody skillfully shares his life experiences.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Mark Christopher Lawrence - Clean Outta Compton
programme.desc: Mark Christopher Lawrence (born May 22, 1964) is an American character actor, stand-up comedian, and voice-over artist. He is perhaps best known for his role as esoteric D.J., Tone Deaf, in the 1994 satirical rap mockumentary, Fear of a Black Hat. He has co-starred in popular films such as Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Planet of the Apes, Lost Treasure and The Pursuit of Happiness. Lawrence can currently be seen in his regular role as Big Mike on the NBC series Chuck. He has made guest appearances on many television programs, most notably Heroes, My Name Is Earl, Crossing Jordan, Dharma & Greg, Malcolm in the Middle, Touched by an Angel, Malcolm & Eddie, Men Behaving Badly, Seinfeld, Murphy Brown, and Martin. He is also featured on the Radio Series Adventures in Odyssey as "Ed Washington".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Chris Voth - Cashmere
programme.desc: Chris Voth is an accomplished comedian, a licensed teacher, and a published author. Voth made his debut late-night television appearance on the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. He also appeared in three seasons of NBC's Last Comic Standing and was chosen for the prestigious Great American Comedy Festival. A 15-year comedy veteran, Voth is a past winner of the Denver Comedy Works Competition and has worked with everyone from Dave Chappelle to Larry the Cable Guy to Linda Ronstadt. Voth’s first comedy CD titled "Never Mind the Jim J Bullocks, Here's the Chris Voth" is currently available for purchase. Chris currently balances his performance schedule with his full-time high-school teaching career. You can read his short story, "Stand Up and Deliver," published in the Cream City Review Literary Journal. In it, Chris shares the experiences he had when entering the teaching field after years in stand-up comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Tim Young - What World is This?
programme.desc: Tim headlines clubs all over North America, has performed on over 500 college campuses as well as comedy festivals in New York, Montreal, and Seattle, and he's a fixture in the New York City club scene. He was a finalist on NBCs Last Comic Standing, has appeared on Comedy Centrals Premium Blend, Tough Crowd, and Shorties, and you may have seen him as a commentator on VH1, MTV, TLC and the E! Channel.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Steve Mazan - Humblebragger
programme.desc: Steve Mazan shot out of the famous San Francisco scene that produced comedy legends such as Robin Williams and Dana Carvey. In his decade-plus career, Steve has done stand-up everywhere from clubs and colleges across the country to corporate events, cruises, and many television shows including The Late Show with David Letterman. He even won an Emmy for his work writing on The Ellen Degeneres Show. His clean and clever comedy landed him on Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, The Bob & Tom Radio Show, Sirius/XM Radio and more. He’s even done audience warm-up for shows such as Deal or No Deal. But of all the performances Steve has done, he is most proud of his eight trips to Iraq and Afghanistan to perform for our troops. He’s also the subject of the award-winning film “Dying to do Letterman.”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Shayne Smith - Alligator Boys
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Shayne Smith delivers more stories about everything from a failed robbery to a wrestling match in the New York Subway and even saving the life of a dog in his second original Dry Bar Comedy special, “Alligator Boys."

With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.desc: When a young man's bride is kidnapped by an evil king, he turns to Hercules for help. The fallen hero has been living in exile, banished for killing his family, but the young man's courage inspires Hercules. Together, they fight to rescue the bride and reclaim Hercules' honor.

programme.title: Jane White is Sick and Twisted
programme.desc: Jane White (Kim Little) is a disturbed young woman living in her own bizarre TV fantasy land. For Jane, life itself is a television program, and she dreams of becoming a star on the small screen. Convincing herself that Gerry King (David L. Lander), a popular talk show host, is her birth father, she sets out on an adventurous road trip -- aided by her equally looney boyfriend, Dick (Wil Wheaton) -- to confront her "father" on the air, and, just maybe, make a splash on reality television.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: Strange things are afoot in the depths of the sea. First a passenger plane vanishes over the Pacific Ocean. Then an oil platform is obliterated. Marine biologist Emma MacNeil (Deborah Gibson) is dispatched to investigate the phenomena, and, with the help of Japanese scientist Seiji Shimada (Vic Chao), she makes a discovery that will rock the world: An enormous prehistoric shark and a giant octopus have been awakened from their icy slumbers -- and they're hungry.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: Before growing into the legendary adviser to the Pendragons, a youthful Merlin spends his days studying with the Mage (Jürgen Prochnow), a master sorcerer, and honing his magical skills. When a fellow apprentice sorcerer, Hengest (Iago McGuire), grows jealous of Merlin's rapid progress, he rebels against their mutual mentor and betrays King Vortigen (Hefin Wyn) to Saxon invaders. As Hengest conjures an army of dragons, Merlin prepares to test his developing abilities in battle.

programme.title: ALTER Collection | Teenage Turmoil
programme.desc: Being a teenager is difficult enough with low self-esteems and jealously, and then come the hand-monsters, alternate realities and demons.

programme.title: ALTER Collection | Laugh to Hide Your Fear
programme.desc: Jokes and scares are all about timing, and we've combined them both for a terrifyingly hilarious time

programme.title: ALTER Collection | Zombies!
programme.desc: You want em, we got em. Enough zombies to eat your brain out.

programme.title: The Time Agent
programme.desc: Time travel is easy... You just wait. Directed by Jude Chun

programme.title: The Reconstruction of William Zero
programme.desc: A geneticist wakes up from an accident with only fragments of his memory is forced to relearn who he is via his twin brother. But as he digs deeper, he discovers he might not be who he thought at all.

programme.title: Sky Line
programme.desc: The concept of an elevator to space is not new. In the world of Arthur C. Clarke, it is a natural progression.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Heroes
programme.desc: Say goodbye to anywhere you recognize, we're headed to strange new worlds in this collection that's far from home.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Spacetime
programme.desc: Characters recognizing their mistakes and attempting to rectify them while stuck in the same day.

programme.title: White Noise
programme.desc: An architect (Michael Keaton) who desires to speak with his wife from beyond the grave becomes obsessed with the supernatural repercussions.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her family, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord.

programme.title: Danika
programme.desc: With the belief that she is going insane, Danika (Marisa Tomei, "My Cousin Vinny"), seeks psychiatric help. But what happens when her gruesome hallucinations start becoming a reality?

programme.title: Along Came the Devil
programme.desc: After a troubled childhood, Ashley searches for a connection and unknowingly invites in a demonic force, leaving her loved ones to fight for her soul.

programme.title: Sprinter
programme.desc: A Jamaican teen burdened by family troubles hopes his rise in track and field can reunite him with his mother.

programme.title: American Warfighter
programme.desc: Rusty Wittenburg is a Navy SEAL struggling to balance his family life and his job. He fights daily to maintain the line between reality and the nightmares his PTSD conjures up for him.

programme.title: The 25th Reich
programme.desc: In 1943, five U.S. soldiers are recruited by the OSS for a time travel mission to save the world from the tyranny of Hitler's 25th Reich.

programme.title: Dossier K
programme.desc: This hard-hitting crime thriller follows two Belgian police detectives as they clash with the Albanian mob and the corrupt ties it has with their department. Subtitled.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: When a young basketball player becomes entangled with drug dealers, he turns to an ex-cop and former private eye. Starring Ice-T, Gary Busey, Fred Williamson and Jim Brown.

programme.desc: This film traces a day in the lives of small-town citizens who find themselves facing mass destruction.
